meanings: (생리 현상 등을) suppress, stifle, stop[resist] (doing), hold[fight, force] back, restrain oneself (from doing)
(감정·충동 등을) suppress, repress, swallow, stifle, control, (formal) refrain (from), force[hold] back
(힘들고 어려운 일을) bear, endure, stand, tolerate, be patient (with), put up with, (informal) hang on
endure[bear] the severity of the treatment
감정 I can't hold any longer.
감정 I can't stand it anymore.

vlive.korean: 아 뭘 또 참아요? You didn't hold anything together! 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 마지막화) 5분 만에 전남친한테 최고의 복수하는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.10
안 돼 - 참아 참아! No. - Sit down! 듣기 View video WINNER : 강승윤 생일 브이라이브 🎉YOONSBIRTHDAY🙏🏼❤️
못참아~ Can't stand it! 듣기 View video SF9 : o_o
조금만 참아 됐다! Hold on a little. Done! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Stray Kids(스트레이 키즈) : SKZ-TALKER(슼즈토커)] Ep.19
숨을 참아보라고요? Try holding in my breath? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just One 10 Minutes

examples.korean: We have to tolerate each other’s little foibles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 서로의 작은 기벽들은 참아 줘야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We have to tolerate each other’s little foibles. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: That does it, I’m off. I’m not having you swear at me like that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 더 이상은 못 참아. 난 가겠어. 네가 그런 식으로 나한테 욕하는 걸 듣고 있을 수 없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: That does it, I’m off. I’m not having you swear at me like that. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Everything can be borne except contempt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경멸만 아니면 모든 것은 참아낼 수 있다. (서양속담, 행복속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: Everything can be borne except contempt. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don’t know how much longer I can put up with her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 언제까지 참아줄 수 있을지 모르겠어. DARAKWON
examples.english: I don’t know how much longer I can put up with her. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It's a lot like nature. You only have as many animals as the ecosystem can support and you only have as many friends as you can tolerate the bitching of. (Randy K. Milholland) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것은 자연과 많이 비슷하다. 생태계가 유지할 수 있는 만큼 많은 동물을 가질 수 있듯이, 당신이 불평을 참아낼 수 있는 만큼 많은 친구를 가질 수 있다. (랜디 K. 멀홀랜드, 친구명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: It's a lot like nature. You only have as many animals as the ecosystem can support and you only have as many friends as you can tolerate the bitching of. (Randy K. Milholland) Add to Wordbook
